content: It's 6:30am on Christmas morning here in Australia, so let me be the first to wish everyone a very Merry Christmas! :holiday_tree::heart:
Well, it's past midnight here, in Greece, as well ...so merry Xmas from my super-excited 10yo daughter and me too :smile:
We should be more inclusive and saying "happy Hanukkah" etc. for other religions btw ...in general, sending happy thoughts and positive energy through the universe :wink:
